EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: The Darkest Luck I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Magical Training feat if you didn't have it already. Each core ability including this one grants: +5 Melee Power +4 Ranged Power +1 Sneak Attack Dice 50 Spell Points +1 Epic DC +5 Force Spell Power and +5 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Step Through Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to conjure a door of pure Shadow, which can take you and your party members to the entrance of the current dungeon. Cooldown: 2 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: The Darkest Luck
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Evasion feat (normal Evasion rules apply). If you already have Evasion, you gain the Improved Evasion feat. If you already have Improved Evasion, you no longer fail Reflex Saves automatically by rolling a 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Cut to the Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+3% Dodge Bypass, +3% Fortification Bypass, +3% Damage versus the Helpless. When you cast the spell Trap the Soul, it automatically applies 3 stacks of the Darkness debuff even if the enemy survives the spell.
Darkness debuff: You are vulnerable to Sneak Attacks. -3 Spell Resistance, -3 PRR and -3 MRR per stack. Lasts 12 seconds, stacks drop 1 at a time. Max 3 stacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Hide and Move Silently. Rank 3: You gain the Hide in Plane Sight feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Cover of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[10/20/30]% less threat from all sources. Rank 3: You gain the benefits of the Nightshield spell.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Well of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] Spell Points Rank 3: +5 Force/Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Assassinate
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Assassinate DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Technician
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] to Search, Spot, Disable Device, and Open Lock. Rank 3: If you have the Nimble Fingers feat, you gain +1 Sneak Attack Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Sleight of Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Use Magic Device. +[25/50/75]% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls and other items that cast spells. Adds +[1/2/3] to the saves DC's of your offensive wands.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Dance in the Dark
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Sneak Attack Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadowform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle. Grants +30% Enhancement bonus to movement speed, 25% Insight bonus to Sneak Speed, 25% Insight bonus to Cast Run Speed, and grants ghost touch on all attacks.

Stance.Name: Shadowform Mantle
Stance.Description: Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle. Grants +30% Enhancement bonus to movement speed, 25% Insight bonus to Sneak Speed, 25% Insight bonus to Cast Run Speed, and grants ghost touch on all attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Lithe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Reflex Saving Throws, Armor Class, and Light Armor Max Dex Bonus. Rank 3: +5 Force and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Epic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Nightmare Lance
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Illusion Spell, deals 1d6+6 Force damage per caster level. Enemies must make a Will save vs (20 + highest ability score + illusion bonuses + fear bonuses) or be cursed with Shadow Loss. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Shadow Loss: You no longer cast a shadow. In addition, you have -5 PRR, MRR, and Spell Resistance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadowstrike (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Melee Attack: +5[W], +3 Critical Threat Range and Critical Damage Multiplier. Enemy must make a Fortitude save vs (20 + highest ability score + assassinate) or be cursed with Shadow Loss. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Shadow Loss: You no longer cast a shadow. In addition, you have -5 PRR, MRR, and Spell Resistance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadowstrike (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Ranged Attack:: +5[W], +3 Critical Threat Range and Critical Damage Multiplier. Enemy must make a Fortitude save vs (20 + highest ability score + assassinate) or be cursed with Shadow Loss. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Shadow Loss: You no longer cast a shadow. In addition, you have -5 PRR, MRR, and Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Grim Precision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration, and you bypass [5/10/15]% enemy Fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadowcaster
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadowcaster
EnhancementSelection.Description: -10% Spell Cooldowns. Immunity to Energy Drain.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadowstriker
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5% Doublestrike and Doubleshot. Immunity to Energy Drain.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Depths of Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle, you gain 25% Incorporeality and 25% Concealment.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to Specialize in.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Epic Strike Upgrade I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an upgrade for your Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark Imbuement
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Epic Strike now imbues your weapons with Evil energies for 10s: You deal 1d6 per Sneak Attack Dice in Untyped damage on hit (scaling with Melee or Ranged Power, or Force Spell Power if its higher), and on a vorpal strike, your attacks blind enemies with no save. This blind lasts 5 seconds and can only apply to each monster once per 60 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Meld into Darkness
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Epic Strike now grants you 10% uncapped dodge for 10s

EnhancementSelection.Name: Paranoia
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Epic Strike now imbues your spells with Evil energies for 10s: Your Sneak Attack dice are now applied to your harmful spell casts. Your spells deal 1d6 Untyped damage per Sneak Attack Dice you have (scaling with Melee or Ranged Power, or Force Spell Power if it is higher). This may only trigger once per spellcast per monster, so multi-hit spells will only have one additional damage value.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Pierce the Gloom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to hit for Sneak attacks, and to-hit while Flanking. Rank 3: You gain Immunity to Silence, Quell, and Blindness.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: From the Shadows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: From-Stealth Active: From a stealthed position, dissolve into shadows, before appearing some distance in front of you. This grants you the buffs from your Shadowdancer Epic strike if you have them trained.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Dark Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shadowdancer Destiny Mantle now grants +[5/10/15]% damage versus the Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Bring Darkness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
When you roll a natural 20 on a melee or ranged attack, you envelop the target in shadow, applying the Darkness debuff. If you have the feat First Blood, the trigger of First Blood now also applies the Darkness debuff, and First Blood now triggers on Harmful Spell casts.
Darkness: The target is no longer immune to Sneak Attacks. -3 Spell Resistance, -3 Physical Resistance Rating and -3 Magical Resistance Rating per stack. Lasts 12 seconds, stacks drop 1 at a time. Max 3 stacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Epic Strike Upgrade II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an upgrade for your Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Imbuement
EnhancementSelection.Description: Dark Imbuement now increases your melee range.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Meld
EnhancementSelection.Description: Meld now grants 15% uncapped Dodge. When enemies miss you in combat while Meld is active, they are blinded by shadows with no save. This blind lasts 5 seconds and can only apply to each monster once per 60 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Paranoia
EnhancementSelection.Description: Paranoia now reduces the cost of all of your Metamagics by 1 Spell Point each.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Weird
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Weird or Consume Shadow

EnhancementSelection.Name: Consumed by Shadows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Stealth Action: Your shadow courses out from you, cursing nearby monsters with Illusory Panic if they fail a Fortitude save versus DC 20 + highest ability score + Assassinate
Illusory Panic: Your Armor Class set to 0 for 5 seconds. When you are struck, you take a stack of Vulnerability, taking 1% more damage.
Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementSelection.Name: Weird
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the Weird spell - Area of effect Phantasmal Killer, scales off Illusion DC. The Weird spell is added to your Spell book as a level 9 spell if you are a Cleric, Sorcerer, Druid, Wizard, or Favored Soul or a level 6 spell if you are an Artificer, Alchemist, Bard, or Warlock. Requires the ability to cast spells of those levels.Cost: 50 Spell Points Cooldown: 60 seconds DC 20 + highest of INT/WIS/CHA + illusion bonuses

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Just a Taste
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have +1 Critical Multiplier on a roll of 19-20 with Bows, Thrown Weapons, Crossbows, and Finesseable melee weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Greater Shadowform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds to your Destiny Mantle: You float as if you had Feather Fall, +20 Hide and Move Silently, and no longer trigger pressure plate or bear traps. +10 Force/Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Greater Shadowdancer Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shadowdancer: Shadow Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Epic Moment: Dissolve into a whorl of shadow, leaving your corporeal form behind. While in this form, you are considered Sneaking and Invisible regardless of what you do. You also gain 3d6 Sneak Attack Dice, 50% Incorporeality, as well as the effects your Epic Strike as if they had been fully trained and upgraded. When non-boss enemies miss you in this state, they are slain by their fear, automatically taking a Phantasmal Killer effect with no save. Duration: 20 seconds. Cooldown: 5 minutes.
